div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 07:56 am CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 78. Southwest wind 11 to 16 mph becoming northwest in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 24 mph.
Partly cloudy, with a low around 43. North northeast wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

A slight chance of showers between 1pm and 4pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4pm. Increasing clouds, with a high near 73. Calm wind becoming south southeast 5 to 7 mph in the afternoon. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.
